description:
'''Rival Sons''' is a [[Rock music|rock]] band formed in [[Long Beach, California]] in 2009 and also affiliated with [[Nashville, Tennessee]]. The band consists of Jay Buchanan (lead vocals), [[Scott Holiday]] (guitar), Dave Beste (bass guitar) and Michael Miley (drums). In their most recent tour they were joined by keyboard player Jesse Nason, and Todd Ã–gren accompanied them on previous tours. They are signed to [[Atlantic Records]] via [[Dave Cobb]]'s label [[Low Country Sound]], an imprint of [[Elektra Records|Elektra]].

They have released eight albums and one EP, and have twice been nominated for Grammy awards.
